010package imagingbook.common.threshold.adaptive;
011
012import ij.plugin.filter.RankFilters;
013import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
014import ij.process.FloatProcessor;
015import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
016import imagingbook.common.util.ParameterBundle;
017
018/**
019 * <p>
020 * This is an implementation of the adaptive thresholder proposed in [1]. See also Sec. 9.2 (Eq. 9.74) of [2].
021 * </p>
022 * <p>
023 * [1] Adaptive thresholder as proposed in J. Sauvola and M. Pietik√§inen, "Adaptive document image binarization",
024 * Pattern Recognition 33(2), 1135-1143 (2000). <br> [2] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An
025 * Algorithmic Introduction</em> 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
026 * </p>
027 *
028 * @author WB
029 * @version 2022/08/01
030 */
031public class SauvolaThresholder implements AdaptiveThresholder {
032        
033        /**
034         * Parameters for class {@link SauvolaThresholder}.
035         */
036        public static class Parameters implements ParameterBundle<SauvolaThresholder> {
037                
038                @DialogUtils.DialogLabel("Radius")
039                public int radius = 15;
040                
041                @DialogUtils.DialogLabel("kappa")
042                public double kappa =  0.5;
043                
044                @DialogUtils.DialogLabel("sigma_max")
045                public double sigmaMax =  128;
046                
047                @DialogUtils.DialogLabel("Background mode")
048                public BackgroundMode bgMode = BackgroundMode.DARK;
049        }
050                
051        private FloatProcessor Imean;
052        private FloatProcessor Isigma;
053        private final Parameters params;
054        
055        public SauvolaThresholder() {
056                super();
057                this.params = new Parameters();
058        }
059        
060        public SauvolaThresholder(Parameters params) {
061                super();
062                this.params = params;
063        }
064        
065        @Override
066        public ByteProcessor getThreshold(ByteProcessor I) {
067                FloatProcessor mean = (FloatProcessor) I.convertToFloat();
068                FloatProcessor var = (FloatProcessor) mean.duplicate();
069                
070                RankFilters rf = new RankFilters();
071                rf.rank(mean, params.radius, RankFilters.MEAN);
072                Imean = mean;
073                
074                rf.rank(var, params.radius, RankFilters.VARIANCE);
075                var.sqrt();
076                Isigma = var;
077                
078                int width = I.getWidth();
079                int height = I.getHeight();
080                final double kappa = params.kappa;
081                final double sigmaMax = params.sigmaMax;
082                final boolean darkBg = (params.bgMode == BackgroundMode.DARK);
083                
084                ByteProcessor Q = new ByteProcessor(width, height);
085                for (int v = 0; v < height; v++) {
086                        for (int u = 0; u < width; u++) {
087                                final double sigma = Isigma.getf(u, v);
088                                final double mu = Imean.getf(u, v);
089                                final double diff = kappa * (sigma / sigmaMax - 1);
090                                int q = (int) Math.rint((darkBg) ? mu * (1 - diff) : mu * (1 + diff));
091                                if (q < 0)
092                                        q = 0;
093                                if (q > 255)
094                                        q = 255;
095                                Q.set(u, v, q);
096                        }
097                }
098                return Q;
099        }
100        
101}
